sentences.sentence: In 1947, Lugt and his wife established the Fondation Custodia to keep the collection intact for future generations.
sentences.translation: 1947年，卢格特夫妇建立了保护基金会，把藏品完好无缺地留给下一代。

sentences.sentence: The English lesson papers, described by Dr Hicks as "quite remarkable", are on loan from the Fondation Napoleon in Paris.
sentences.translation: 这几张被希克斯博士称为“不平凡的”学习英语的碎纸片是从巴黎拿破仑基金会借来的。

sentences.sentence: Paris, France, until February 23: Contact, an exhibition by Olafur Eliasson - one of the most important contemporary light artists - at the new Fondation Louis Vuitton by Frank Gehry.
sentences.translation: 法国巴黎，展览至2月23日：接触——奥拉·维尔·埃利亚松作品展，奥拉·维尔·埃利亚松是现代最重要的灯光艺术家之一，展览在弗兰克·盖里设计的巴黎路易·威登基金会艺术中心举办。
